Thank you so much mrehabaly. With the repack of the game and this files it's working normal for me. Everything in English now.

I did the mod of the .reg file exactly as you wrote in the repack torrent. I see that here is not complete, so I will post it here again just to make sure everybody do it right.

So, after doing everything for unraring and copying the files from this torrent, the next procedure has to be done as last step: 
.......................................................................
How to change

Open notepad and paste the below lines

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

 [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREDanger Close GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter]
 "GDFBinary"="C:GamesMedal of Honor WarfighterGDFBinary_ru_RU.dll"
 "Locale"="ru_RU"
 "Install Dir"="C:GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeDanger Close GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter]
 "GDFBinary"="C:GamesMedal of Honor WarfighterGDFBinary_ru_RU.dll"
 "Locale"="ru_RU"
 "Install Dir"="C:GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter"

Change GDFBinary dll name & path, Locale, Dir path
 Save as warfighter.reg
 Run the reg file

NOTE: if you want French change GDFBinary_ru_RU.dll to GDFBinary_fr_FR.dl

Same for other languages..
 JP,KO,PL,RU,FR,DE,ES,EN
